article.bdy:
The primary purpose of this list is to serve as a holding place for the identities of Bioinformatics companies, particularly those for which articles have not yet been created. Three elements would be useful to include: a link to the article, a link to the company on the web (their external homepage), and a brief description of the company.
This is an , which may never be able to satisfy certain standards for completeness. You can help by expanding it.
List of Companies
Accelrys
Agile Molecule provides software for biomolecular simulations.
Ariadne Genomics homepage Ariadne Pathway Studio software builds and displays molecular pathways and helps scientists to uncover connections of biomedical interest. The Ariadne difference is the interactive software interface and the computational approach to generating database content from the literature.
ATGCLabs homepage brings together the best practices of science and bioinformatics software development
BIOBASE
homepage provides biological databases, bioinformatics solutions for expression data, promoter and pathway analysis and KPO services
BioCOS Life Sciences homepage, Computing Systems and Signals for Biomedical and Life Sciences, Biomedical Signal & Image Processing and Integrated Proteomics and transcriptomics Biomarkers discovery, along various computing tools and research analysis software.
Biomatters homepage develops unique and easy to use and essential bioinformatics software Geneious that speeds up and simplifies research for all molecular biologists and biochemists
Biomax Informatics AG
homepage bioinformatics services and solutions
BioMolTech homepage develops Lead Finder software solution for molecular docking, virtual screening and protein-ligand binding energy estimation
CLC Bio homepage Free Bioinformatics workbenches.
Detectorvision homepage providing the deltaMasses package for detection of protein modifications. Life Science IT consulting.
Ebiotics homepage is a provider of custom software (made-to-order) for BioInformatics, Biotech, BioEngineering and Pharmaceutical Companies.
Gene Codes Corporation
Genedata homepage provides software products and services for data analysis and storage in Transcriptomics, Toxicogenomics, High-throughput screening (HTS), Genomics and related disciplines.
Genomatix, homepage offering biology driven analysis pipelines for microarray analysis, ChIP on Chip and Solexa/454 data. Multiple tools and databases for analysis of gene regulation. Comparative genomics and most complete and quality checked genomic annotation for 17 species.
Illumina, inc. homepage
Korea Computer Centre Sinhung Company
Korilog homepage, providing KoriBlast a reliable graphical environment dedicated to BLAST data mining.
MacVector homepage, providing MacVector. MacVector is a comprehensive Macintosh application that provides sequence editing, primer design, internet database searching, protein analysis, sequence confirmation, multiple sequence alignment, phylogenetic reconstruction, coding region analysis, and a wide variety of other functions.
Ocimum Biosolutions Ltd, homepage offering lab information and knowledge management systems, genomics, proteomics, bioinformatics and custom contract services (India and USA).
Partek Inc. homepage provides software for powerful statistical analysis and interactive data visualization of high-dimensional data.
Premier Biosoft , homepage Software for cell biology researchers and contract Bioinformatics development.
Rosetta Biosoftware homepage
SimBioSys develops the eHITS software for molecular docking (flexible ligand docking & fast pre-docking), pharmacophore modelling, de novo design and retrosynthetic analysis software tools
TimeLogic homepage offering accelerated BLAST, Smith-Waterman, and HMM search algorithms
Transinsight develops GoPubMed, a literature search engine
Tripos Informatics homepage, pioneering breakthroughs in aiding drug discovery through its proprietary informatics and research technologies
Indian bioinformatics companies List http://bioinfocompanies.blogspot.com/
Worldwide bioinformatics companies Bioinformatics.fr This website provides a Google map view feature that allows people to see the bioinformatics company that is the closest to their place.
